Text:
WRC: FIA World Rally Championship 3 (c) PQube
Date: 09-2012 Languages: English
Platform: PS3 Genre: Racing
Release Info:
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 The official game of the WRC is back, fully updated to the contents of the 
 2011 Official Championship and with brand-new contents and game modes! The 
 real excitement of drifts, jumps, handbrakes and also crashes returns on 
 PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and PC!

needs Fw 4.21 - enjoy
